title: Single-screw rubber extruders
description: Extrusion of special rods, tubes, sheets and profiles with a range of rubber screw diameters from 30 to 150 mm. Screw lengths range from 8D to 20D, enabling flexible output from 20 kg/h to 1,500 kg/h.

title: Degassing filter extruders
description: Extrusion and filtration of high value-added materials with screw diameters ranging from 30 to 90 mm. This technology offers a throughput improvement of up to 30% compared with conventional extruders.

title: Coextrusion line
description: Multi-layer extrusion, profile and rod cutting with modular extruder solutions, vulcanizing equipment, conveying and die-cutting. Line capacity up to 1,500 kg/h.

title: Thermoplastic extruders
description: Extrusion of profiles, tubes, rods, etc., with plastic screw diameters ranging from 30 to 120 mm. Screw lengths range from 10D to 35D, enabling throughputs from 20 kg/h to 800 kg/h.

title: H.P.B Equipement
description: In order to guarantee the follow-up of the machines built and parts supplied by HPB EQUIPEMENT, we have been given exclusive rights to own and use the companyâ€™s technical and commercial archives.

title: Single-screw silicone extruders
description: Profile extrusion and sheathing for medical and aerospace applications. Silicone screw diameters from 30 to 120 mm with screw lengths from 8D to 15D. Throughput capacities ranging from 20 kg/h to 800 kg/h.

title: Rubber roll mill
description: Allowing the mixing of materials with additives, this equipment offers cylinder diameters ranging from 55 to 250 mm. Table dimensions range from 150 to 500 mm, with batch capacities from 0.1 kg to 8 kg.

title: Nanomaterials Mixer
description: Designed for automated, confined mixing of materials enriched with nanomaterials, this equipment offers cylinder diameters ranging from 110 to 400 mm. The table is available in sizes from 250 to 1,000 mm, with batch capacities ranging from 0.5 kg to 40 kg.

title: Automatic mixing system
description: Lescuyer system to automate the mixing phase on cylinder mixers Retrofittable to all brands and types of mixers Option available on all Lescuyer cylinder mixers

title: PVC roll mill
description: Allowing the mixing of materials with additives, this equipment offers cylinder diameters ranging from 55 to 250 mm. Table dimensions range from 150 to 500 mm, with batch capacities from 0.1 kg to 8 kg.

title: Automatic mixing system
description: Lescuyer system to automate the mixing phase on cylinder mixers Retrofittable to all brands and types of mixers Option available on all Lescuyer cylinder mixers

title: Rubber roll mill
description: Designed for mixing materials with heat-sensitive additives, this equipment offers cylinder diameters from 300 to 750 mm. Table sizes range from 650 to 2,500 mm. This mixer is used for batches ranging from 15 kg to 200 kg.

title: Our knives for roll mill
description: Experience industrial excellence with the LESCUYER VILLENEUVE roll mill knife. Designed for professionals, this knife offers cutting-edge technology for optimum handling of rubber and plastic materials.

title: Internal mixer with intermeshing rotors
description: This mixer enables efficient dispersion of additives in a batch of product, with tank capacities ranging from 0.5 to 50 liters. Equipped with intermeshing rotors, it is suitable for batches ranging from 0.4 to 45 kg.

title: Modular internal laboratory mixer
description: This mixer offers the possibility of dispersing additives in two modular systems, allowing the rotor or tank volume to be varied. It comprises two tanks with identical or different useful volumes, ranging from 0.5 to 5 liters. This mixer is suitable for batches ranging from 2 x 0.4 kg to 2 x 4.5 kg.

title: Internal mixer with tangential rotors
description: This mixer enables efficient dispersion of additives in a batch of product, with tank capacities ranging from 0.5 to 50 liters. Equipped with tangential rotors, it is suitable for batches ranging from 0.4 to 45 kg.

title: Modular internal laboratory mixer
description: This mixer offers the possibility of dispersing additives in two modular systems, allowing the rotor or tank volume to be varied. It comprises two tanks with identical or different useful volumes, ranging from 0.5 to 5 liters. This mixer is suitable for batches ranging from 2 x 0.4 kg to 2 x 4.5 kg.
